name: DDL Stremio Addon V2
description: A self-hosted Stremio addon to stream from Direct Download Links (DDLs).

BASE_URL.description: The public URL of your application, automatically set by Scalingo.

MONGO_URI.description: Your MongoDB connection string, automatically provided by the addon.

TMDB_API_KEY.description: Your API key from The Movie Database (TMDb).

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Username for the web admin panel.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Password for the web admin panel.
